question: I didn't know Kai was in town. I didn't call him for dinner.

answers.text: If I had known Kai was in town, I would have called him for dinner.
I had called Kai for dinner if I had know he was in town.
I would have called Kai for dinner if I have known he was in town.

correct_answer: If I had known Kai was in town, I would have called him for dinner.
